projects.title: HTML CV template
projects.description: The main reason to make own CV website was to avoid troublesome updates to PDF CV's version. Thanks to having it as a template I can easily add new infomation whenever I want. Also I have found it a good opportunity to check if Kotlin may be right choice for building web applications.
